presentationColumns.name: Order Number
presentationColumns.description: Returns the Oder Number from the Revenue Facts table

presentationColumns.name: Order Status
presentationColumns.description: Returns the Oder Status value from the Revenue Facts table.  Naturally drills into Orders Number Column.

presentationColumns.name: Order Type
presentationColumns.description: Returns the Oder Type value from the Revenue Facts table. Naturally drills into Orders Status Column.

presentationColumns.name: Order Size Bin
presentationColumns.description: This is a logical calculation object that buckets the order by their size (revenue per order). The calculation is done on the fly by OBIEE server and results in 5 buckets.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.D3 Orders (Facts Attributes).Order Size Bin

presentationColumns.name: Order to Bill Days
presentationColumns.description: This is a logical calculation object that computes for ech order, the number of days between order date and bill date.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.D3 Orders (Facts Attributes).Order to Bill Days

presentationColumns.name: Order to Bill Days Bin
presentationColumns.description: This is a logical calculation object that buckets each order into a group, based on the number of days between order date and bill date. The calculation is done on the fly by BIEE server.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.D3 Orders (Facts Attributes).Order to Bill Days Bin
